verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees.<s%> Out of the <S%H4480>depths<s%> <S%H4615><s%> have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice:<s%> let thine <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mayest be <S%H3372>feared.<s%>
I wait <S%H6960>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> doth <S%H6960>wait,<s%> and in his <S%H1697>word<s%> do I <S%H3176>hope.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> waiteth for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> more than they that <S%H4480>watch<s%> <S%H8104><s%> for the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> I say, more than they that <S%H8104>watch<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> there is <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and <S%H5973>with<s%> him is <S%H7235>plenteous<s%> <S%H6304>redemption.<s%>
